basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Gerry C. Pinkston Endowed Graduate Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Gerry Pinkston Graduate Scholarship

description: This fund provides scholarships for graduate students within the Department of Kinesiology and Health Studies. Eligibility Requirements Graduate degree in the department of Kinesiology and Health Studies Minimum 2.75 GPA Must submit a personal statement including career goals, financial need and evidence of professional development Must be enrolled in at least 6 credit hours when the scholarship is received Recipient must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
